an5.294-302:4.1: A Jain … disciple of the shavelings … a matted-hair ascetic … a wanderer … a follower of Māgaṇḍiya … a trident-bearing ascetic … a follower of the unobstructed … a follower of Gotama … one who performs rituals for the gods …
an5.294-302:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.294-302:4.4: One who performs rituals for the gods who has these five qualities is cast down to hell.”
